title: The Answer Trap Risk Profile Survey
introText: Welcome to The Answer Trap Risk Profile Survey. This assessment will help you understand your decision-making patterns and risk tolerance. Please answer all questions honestly for the most accurate results.

introQuestions.text: How many years of experience do you have?

categories.name: Decision Making
categories.description: This category evaluates your approach to making decisions and problem-solving strategies.

questions.text: When faced with a complex decision, I tend to:

scoringRanges.title: Analytical
scoringRanges.description: You prefer thorough analysis and careful consideration in decision-making.

scoringRanges.title: Collaborative
scoringRanges.description: You balance analysis with team input and consensus-building.

scoringRanges.title: Intuitive
scoringRanges.description: You trust your instincts and prefer quick, decisive action.

categories.name: Risk Assessment
categories.description: This category assesses how you evaluate and respond to uncertainty and potential risks.

questions.text: When evaluating risks, I focus on:

scoringRanges.title: Risk Averse
scoringRanges.description: You are cautious and focus on potential negative outcomes when assessing risks.

scoringRanges.title: Risk Balanced
scoringRanges.description: You take a balanced approach, weighing both risks and opportunities.

scoringRanges.title: Risk Seeking
scoringRanges.description: You are optimistic and focus on potential rewards when evaluating uncertainty.

scoringRanges.title: Low Risk
scoringRanges.description: You tend to be very cautious and methodical in your approach to decision-making.

scoringRanges.title: Moderate Risk
scoringRanges.description: You balance caution with opportunity, taking calculated risks when appropriate.

scoringRanges.title: High Risk
scoringRanges.description: You are comfortable with uncertainty and tend to take bold actions.
